# Mermaid diagram source
```mermaid
graph LR
  A{What kind of data is it?} -->|Point data| B{What kind of point data?}
  A --> |Point cloud| I
  B --> |Points in 3D space| C[CSV, GeoJSON]
  B --> |Points projected onto terrain| D[CSV, WFS, WMS]
  A --> |3D geometry| E{What kind of 3D geometry?}
  E --> |CAD drawing or BIM| I[3d tiles]
  E --> |Many 3D objects| I
  E --> |Single object| J{"Does it have per-feature metadata (eg. labels)?"}
  J --> |Yes| I
  J --> |No| G{How many vertices does it have?}
  G --> |More than 10,000| I
  G --> |Less than 10,000| H[glTF]
  E --> |2D shapes in 3D space| K{How many polygons?}
  K --> |Thousands or more| J
  K --> |Hundreds| F[GeoJSON]
```
# Mermaid config
```json
{
  "theme": "base",
  "themeVariables": {
    "primaryColor": "#00bce6",
    "secondaryColor": "#dadbdc",
    "lineColor": "#001d34"
  }
}
```
